id.description: Unique identifier for the organization record.

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating the last update date of the organization record.

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating the creation date of the organization record.

country.description: The country where the organization is located.

postal_code.description: The postal code of the organization's location.

locality.description: The locality or city where the organization is situated.

contact_name.description: The name of the contact person within the organization.

contact_email.description: The email address used for contact purposes.

contact_phone.description: The phone number of the contact person within the organization.

address_line_1.description: The first line of the organization's address.

administrative_district_level_1.description: The first-level administrative district of the organization's location.

accepted_term_version.description: The version of the terms and conditions accepted by the organization.

contact_phone_optin.description: Flag indicating if contact person has opted in for phone contact.

notifications_enabled.description: Flag indicating if notifications are enabled for the organization.

type.description: The type or category of the organization.

state.description: The state or region where the organization is located.

roles.description: List of roles assigned to the organization.

items.description: A specific role assigned to the organization.

my_display_name.description: The public display name of the organization.

my_invited_email.description: Email address of the member invited to the organization.

my_member_id.description: Unique identifier of the member within the organization.

createdByCaller.description: Record of the creator of the organization within the system.
